channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- puppet-tripleo

item.title: CVE-2016-9599|2024-08-06T02:59:03.011Z -- unspecified -- puppet-tripleo
item.description: puppet-tripleo before versions 5.5.0, 6.2.0 is vulnerable to an access-control flaw in the IPtables rules management, which allowed the creation of TCP/UDP rules with empty port values. If SSL is enabled, a malicious user could use these open ports to gain access to unauthorized resources.
